fixes.name: Change in Netting
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression that subtracts two calculated fields into a Power BI DAX measure by referencing the two calculated fields on the same table using the required 'TableName'[Column] syntax. The referenced fields are aggregation/LOD-based, so the result is implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references LOD/aggregate logic (FIXED and SUM-based calculated fields), therefore it must be created as a measure.
